sentences.en: Anatomically, the nervous system is divided into the central nervous system and the peripheral nervous system.
sentences.cn: 解剖学上把神经组织分为中枢神经系统和周围神经系统.

sentences.en: Companies are increasingly keen to contract out peripheral activities like training.
sentences.cn: 公司越来越倾向于把像培训这样的非核心业务外包出去。

sentences.en: Her involvement in the case was peripheral.
sentences.cn: 她在这宗案件中是从犯。

sentences.en: Highly - displacement drilling is an effective technology to exploit peripheral oilfield.
sentences.cn: 摘要大位移钻井是开发边际油田的有效手段.

sentences.en: It is likely that the antitremor effect is peripheral.
sentences.cn: 这种抗震颤作用似乎是外周性的.

sentences.en: Objective To analyse the MRI findings of peripheral neurogenic tumors.
sentences.cn: 目的分析外周性神经源性肿瘤的MRI表现.

sentences.en: Peripheral biotopes are relatively small, and patchy.
sentences.cn: 外围群落生境是相当小的并呈斑点状.

sentences.en: Peripheral deposition is favored by deep inspiration , slow respiratory rate , breath - holding, and airways obstruction.
sentences.cn: 深向慢慢呼吸 、 屏息和气道阻塞,有助于周边沉降.

sentences.en: Peripheral lymph nodes may be enlarged.
Programmers like wizards because they get to treat users like peripheral devices.
sentences.cn: 程序员喜欢向导,因为他们像对待外围设备一样对待用户.

sentences.en: Science is peripheral to that debate.

sentences.en: Seen with pulmonary hypertension are small peripheral pulmonary arteries are thickened.

sentences.en: The neurofibromas are multiple benign neoplasms of the peripheral nervous system, arising from mesodermally - derived Schwann cells.
sentences.cn: 神经纤维瘤是外围神经系统的多发良性肿瘤,由中胚叶的雪氏细胞发生.

sentences.en: The normal response to a drop in body temperature is peripheral vasoconstricition.
sentences.cn: 体温下降时正常的反应是周围血管收缩.

sentences.en: There was good wits, incisive but always peripheral information.
sentences.cn: 宴会上有时妙语连珠,谈吐锋利而所论却总不免是些毛皮小事.

sentences.en: Thus , though the marrow is quite cellular, there can be peripheral cytopenias.
sentences.cn: 虽然骨髓有非常多的细胞, 但外周血细胞减少.
